contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=January 2007}} {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = Quietdrive EP| Type = [[EP]]| Artist = [[Quietdrive]] | Cover = Quietdrive EP.jpg | Released = August 4, 2004 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = | Label = [[Epic Records|Epic]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Leaving Dramatics EP]]''<br/>(2003) | This album = '''''Quietdrive EP'''''<br/>(2005) | Next album = ''[[Fall from the Ceiling EP]]''<br/>(2006) | }} '''''Quietdrive EP''''' by [[Quietdrive]] was released on August 4, 2004 under [[Epic Records]]. ==Track listing== # "Irreversible" # "Everyone And Everything" # "Ransom Diaries" # "Handsome Devil's Benediction" ==Personnel== *[[Kevin Truckenmiller]] - Vocals, Guitar, Violin *[[Matt Kirby]] - Vocals, Guitar *[[Justin Bonhiver]] - Guitar *[[Droo Hastings]] - Bass *[[Brandon Lanier]] - Drums {{DEFAULTSORT:Quietdrive Ep}} [[Category:2004 EPs]]
